Package by.bsuir.mycoolsite.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service interface for managing user-related operations. Implementations of this interface should provide methods for user sign-in, checking film ownership, checking if a user is banned, user registration, banning and unbanning users, and retrieving a list of banned users.

  • Method Details

    • signIn

      User signIn(String email, String password) throws ServiceException
      Authenticates a user by verifying the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      the User object representing the authenticated user
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • isFilmOwner

      boolean isFilmOwner(long userId, long filmId) throws ServiceException
      Checks if a user is the owner of a specific film.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      filmId - the ID of the film
      Returns:
      true if the user is the owner, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • isBanned

      boolean isBanned(long id) throws ServiceException
      Checks if a user is banned.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is banned, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • registration

      long registration(User user) throws ServiceException
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object containing registration details
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly registered user
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • ban

      void ban(long userId, long adminId) throws ServiceException
      Bans a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to be banned
      adminId - the ID of the administrator performing the action
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • unban

      void unban(long userId) throws ServiceException
      Unbans a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to be unbanned
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • getBannedUsers

      List<User> getBannedUsers() throws ServiceException
      Retrieves a list of banned users.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation
